author: pipermerriam
content: I think that there are enough of you (CDAP folks) that it may make sense to look into prototyping one of the pending networks such as chain history (low difficulty), transaction gossip (medium difficulty).  This isn't meant to discourage anyone from working on the state network parts which is what the current teams are focused on righ tnow.

author: kolbyml
content: Much like aust9n I am also in CDAP and my project is also implementing the uTP sub-protocol for Discovery v5. I am planning to implement it in rust into the discv5 library Trin is using. Well he is implementing it for the Fluffy client. I think Fluffy and Trin are the two major clients trying to support the portal network therefore the two clients it makes sense to implement this in.
